markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Vigilante](/Traits.aspx?ID=326)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 271 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Using actions and abilities with the vigilante trait while in your social identity risks exposing you as a [vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80).
name: Vigilante
